AT.name: Lifespeed
AT.description: Lifespeed ist der ultimative Überlebenskampf. Besiege deine Gegner, während du mit Höchstgeschwindigkeit durch Tunnelsysteme fliegst. Dein Planet braucht dich! Vor tausend Jahren drohte ein großer Krieg, die Galaxie zu vernichten. Der Galaktische Staat wurde gegründet, um die drohende Apokalypse aufzuhalten. Jetzt gibt es einen neuen Völkermord namens Lifespeed. Statt Krieg zu führen, werden Dispute um Ressourcen und Überleben auf der Rennstrecke ausgetragen. Jeder Fahrer wird gezwungen, um das Überleben seines Planeten zu kämpfen und zu versuchen, Archon zu werden. Du bist Cypher Reid.

AU.name: Lifespeed
AU.description: Lifespeed is the ultimate race for survival. Battle your galactic opponents while flying at high speed through exciting tunnels. Your planet needs you! One thousand years ago a Great War threatened to engulf the galaxy. The United Government was formed to stop the impending Armageddon. Now there is a new genocide called Lifespeed. Instead of war, disputes about resources and survival are settled on the track. Each rider is forced to compete for their planet’s survival and for the chance to become Archon. You are Cypher Reid.

BG.name: Lifespeed
BG.description: Lifespeed is the ultimate race for survival. Battle your galactic opponents while flying at high speed through exciting tunnels. Your planet needs you! One thousand years ago a Great War threatened to engulf the galaxy. The United Government was formed to stop the impending Armageddon. Now there is a new genocide called Lifespeed. Instead of war, disputes about resources and survival are settled on the track. Each rider is forced to compete for their planet’s survival and for the chance to become Archon. You are Cypher Reid.

BE.name: Lifespeed
BE.description: Lifespeed est la course ultime de survie. Combattez vos adversaires galactiques tout en volant à grande vitesse à travers les tunnels les plus excitants ! Votre planète a besoin de vous ! Il y a mille ans, la Grande Guerre menaçait d'engloutir la galaxie. Le United Government fut alors formé pour mettre fin à l'imminent Armageddon. Maintenant, il y a un nouveau génocide que l'on appelle Lifespeed. Au lieu de faire la guerre, les disputes pour les ressources et la survie sont réglées sur la piste. Chaque coureur est forcé de concourir pour la survie de leur planète et pour la chance de devenir Archon. Vous êtes Cypher Reid.

ES.name: Lifespeed
ES.description: Lifespeed es la carrera final por la supervivencia. Enfréntate a tus oponentes galácticos mientras vuelas a gran velocidad a través de emocionantes túneles. ¡Tu planeta te necesita! Hace mil años, una gran guerra amenazaba con hundir la galaxia. Los United Government se formaron para detener el inminente Armagedón y ahora hay un nuevo genocidio llamado Lifespeed. En lugar de la guerra, los conflictos sobre los recursos y la supervivencia se deciden en la pista. Cada piloto se ve obligado a competir por la supervivencia de su planeta y por la oportunidad de convertirse en Archon . Tú eres Cypher Reid.

IT.name: Lifespeed
IT.description: Lifespeed è la gara definitiva per la sopravvivenza. Sfida i tuoi avversari galattici volando ad alta velocità attraverso esaltanti gallerie. Il tuo pianeta ha bisogno di te! Mille anni fa una Grande Guerra minacciava di inghiottire la galassia. Il Governo Unito venne costituito per fermare l'imminente Armageddon. Ora vi è un nuovo genocidio chiamato Lifespeed. Invece che tramite guerre, le dispute sulle risorse e sulla sopravvivenza vengono risolte sulla pista. Ogni pilota è costretto a competere per la sopravvivenza del proprio pianeta e per la possibilità di diventare Arconte. Tu sei Cypher Reid.

Instead of war, disputes about resources and survival are settled on the track. Each rider is forced to compete for their planet’s survival and for the chance to become Archon. You are Cypher Reid.

NL.name: Lifespeed
NL.description: Lifespeed is de ultieme overlevingsrace: een kosmische strijd met tegenstanders vliegend op hoge snelheid in spannende tunnels. Jouw planeet rekent op je! Duizend jaar geleden dreigde een Grote Oorlog ons sterrenstelsel te verwoesten. De Verenigde Regering werd opgericht om Armageddon te voorkomen. Nu heeft genocide een nieuwe vorm: Lifespeed. Conflicten om grondstoffen en overleving worden niet op het slagveld, maar op de racebaan beslecht. Piloten vechten voor het voortbestaan van hun planeet en voor de kans om Archon te worden. Jij bent Cypher Reid.

NZ.name: Lifespeed
NZ.description: Lifespeed is the ultimate race for survival. Battle your galactic opponents while flying at high speed through exciting tunnels. Your planet needs you! One thousand years ago a Great War threatened to engulf the galaxy. The United Government was formed to stop the impending Armageddon. Now there is a new genocide called Lifespeed. Instead of war, disputes about resources and survival are settled on the track. Each rider is forced to compete for their planet’s survival and for the chance to become Archon. You are Cypher Reid.

PL.name: Lifespeed
PL.description: Lifespeed is the ultimate race for survival. Battle your galactic opponents while flying at high speed through exciting tunnels. Your planet needs you! One thousand years ago a Great War threatened to engulf the galaxy. The United Government was formed to stop the impending Armageddon. Now there is a new genocide called Lifespeed. Instead of war, disputes about resources and survival are settled on the track. Each rider is forced to compete for their planet’s survival and for the chance to become Archon. You are Cypher Reid.

PT.name: Lifespeed
PT.description: Lifespeed é a derradeira corrida pela sobrevivência. Combate os teus adversários galácticos ao voar em altas velocidades através de túneis emocionantes. O teu planeta precisa de ti! Mil anos atrás, uma Grande Guerra ameaçava consumir a galáxia. O Governo Unido foi formado para parar o iminente Armageddon. Agora há um novo genocídio chamado Lifespeed. Em vez de guerras, disputas sobre recursos e sobrevivência são resolvidas na pista. Cada piloto é obrigado a competir pela sobrevivência do seu planeta e para a oportunidade de se tornar Archon. Tu és Cypher Reid.

RU.name: Lifespeed
RU.description: Lifespeed - это конечная гонка на выживание. Сражайтесь со своими галактическими противниками, пролетая на высокой скорости через захватывающие туннели. Ваша планета нуждается в вас! Тысячу лет назад Великая Война угрожала поглотить галактику. Объединенное Правительство (United Government) было сформировано , чтобы остановить надвигающейся Армагеддон. Теперь идёт новое сражение, называемое Lifespeed. Вместо войны, разногласия по ресурсам и выживанию решаются на трассе. Каждый участник вынужден бороться за выживание своей планеты и за возможность стать Правителем (Арконом). Вы - Cypher Reid.
